titlestmt.titleproper: Miscellaneous oversize family charts and certificates 1865-1990
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

did.unittitle: Miscellaneous oversize family charts and certificates
did.repository: The Historical Society of Pennsylvania 1300 Locust Street Philadelphia, PA 19107

scopecontent.p: Miscellaneous oversized family charts and certificates, some from Hoagland collection and other manuscript collections. Subjects include the Baker family (Ray Stannard Baker), Frederick Fraley and Conrad Baker Sr., the Pepper family, the Foulke family, the Ryan and Shoemaker families, the Parker family, the Bond-Hall relationship, and various Teagues, including Frances Josephine Stratton and Ellen Crawford Teague. There are also confirmation certificates for members of the Wagner family (see Haines collection for more) and marriage certificates for the Royer family. The collection also includes a "family chart" for the Philadelphia Inquirer/Public Ledger, which includes a published article by Nicholas Wainwright.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
